Class Shape2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComplexShape, SimpleShape

    abstract class Shape2D
extends java.lang.Object
    [Shape2D.java] The class is an abstract class that creates two dimensional shape objects, which can be drawn and modified by the user. All shapes available to the user fall under the Shape2D class. All two dimensional shapes have basic data including coordinates for reference, area, perimeter and type.
    Version:
    1.0, Oct 9, 2020
    Author:
    Braydon Wang
